note.p: Birth: His sister's house in Abingdon, Berkshire, England (1684)
Burial Place: St Helen's Church, Abingdon
Education: Apprenticed to his father and then to Joseph Bateman of St Thomas's Hospital
Career: Surgeon to St Thomas's Hospital; retired to Abingdon (before 1736); friend of William Stukeley (FRS 1718)
Freemason, member 1723 and 1725, unnamed and unnnumbered Lodge at Swan, Ludgate Street, London
'Freemasons and the Royal Society; Alphabetical List of Fellows of the Royal Society who are Masons' The Library and Museum of Freemasonry, 2010 page 9
